reviewText: Ok first of all I would like to say that his is ok in theory,but for someone that is really serious about learning Tai Chi Chuan its really hard finding some real legit people so I suggest two MastersMaster Liang, Shou-Yu and Dr. Yang, Jwing-Ming these two are the best to me. as far as this video goes it is ok but if you are looking for more thero practice  I would seek the other masters for guidance and you will see why.
